channel.title: Ai on Mauri870's dev blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on Mauri870's dev blog

item.title: Audio Spectrograms in Tensorflow
item.description: A Spectrogram is a picture of sound. A common approach for audio classification tasks is to use spectrograms as input and simply treat the audio as an image. After several tries I finally got an optimized way to integrate the spectrogram generation pipeline into the tensorflow computational graph.

item.title: How to export the CIFAR10 model to Tensorflow Serving
item.description: The CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 60000 32x32 colour images in 10 classes, with 6000 images per class. In this blog post I’ll cover how to export a trained CIFAR-10 tensorflow model to Tensorflow Serving.

item.title: Writing a Golang client for the Tensorflow Serving Inception model
item.description: Tensorflow Serving is the most optimized way to serve a Tensorflow machine learning model in production. The official tutorials only cover the python client, so lets implement a Go/Golang one.
